DOC.brief_summary: General anesthesia ( GA ) paralysis factor facilitate atelectasis formation , especially obese patient . Spontaneous breathe reduce amount atelectasis . In study , investigator comaparing obese patient undergo hip arthroplasty GA versus spinal anesthesia . Distribution ventilation anesthesia assess eletrical impedance tomography ( EIT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Spontaneous Breathing Ventilation Distribution Obese Patients
DOC.criteria: BMI > 30 age 1885 elective hip arthroplasty general anesthesia spinal anesthesia pregnancy/breastfeeding allergy drug use anesthesia contraindication EIT severe cardiac pulmonary comorbidities unable consent understand/follow study
